name: Abandoned Test Bunker
description: This is a bunker that used to house an experimental lab. They seemed to test advanced cybernetics, but it's abandoned now. No telling what's inside.

items.name: Computer Battery
items.description: Looking around, you see what looks like a small car battery on the ground. It\"s too small for a car, though. But, it should have enough juice to power a small machine or computer for a short time.
items.pickups: Pickup Computer Battery, Computer Battery, Battery
items.descAlreadyHave: There's nothing else of use here, besides the battery you've already picked up.
items.descItemPickup: You've picked up the small battery!

items.name: Dead Energy Core
items.description: Rummaging around the old boxes and shelves, you find a cylindrical battery of some sort. It seems to replicate an energy core for your mechanical walker. It is dead though. Maybe there is a place to charge is somewhere in this bunker?
items.pickups: Pickup Energy Core, Pickup Dead Energy Core, Pickup Core, Dead Energy Core, Core, Energy Core
items.descAlreadyHave: You've already picked up the dead energy core from here.
items.descItemPickup: You've picked up the dead energy core! Now to find a place to charge it.

items.name: Walker Chest Armor
items.description: Looking across all the armor plates and heavy metals, you find something that can can fit onto your walker's chest area!
items.pickups: Pickup Walker Chest Armor, Pickup Armor, Pickup Chest Armor, Pickup Walker Chest, Walker Chest Armor
items.descAlreadyHave: There's no other armor that can be fitted to your walker! Everything else is too heavy.
items.descItemPickup: You picked up the walker chest armor. It's a little heavy, but with a shove here and a push there, you get it up onto your walker. It fits pretty well and looks sturdy! You've fit it better when you get back home.

items.name: Walker Plasma Gun
items.description: Amongst the weapons and guns, you find a plasma gun that should fit just right with your walker. Although, it seems to need ammo cartridges.
items.pickups: Pickup Plasma Gun, Pickup Walker Plasma Gun, Pickup Gun
items.descAlreadyHave: You already have the most useful weapon from this room. Everything else either doesn't or just won't fit.
items.descItemPickup: You picked up the plasma gun. It was a little difficult to lift but it fit snuggly onto your walker's arm.

rooms.name: Entrance
rooms.description: You are in the entrance of the bunker. It has a small desk and a check in area. Although, you feel like that is no longer needed. To the east is a hallway that goes deeper into the dark bunker. You can tell several rooms connect to it. To the south is a room with what looks like a bunch of old wires and circuit breakers.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: Moving into the hallway, you can see four separate directions you can take. To the north looks like another hallway except smaller and with some shelves and boxes. To the east looks like a room with a bunch of food. You can smell the old grease coming from it. To the south is a large hall which looks like it used to serve as a common area for the bunker, but now, there is a sign that says stay out. You hear thunderous bombs in the room. To the west is the entrance where you came into the bunker.

rooms.name: Side Storage
rooms.description: Entering the storage area, you find it's full of shelves, boxes, and other small equipment. To the east is a barricaded door that is slightly ajar. The label says "Weapon Room". To the south is the hallway that you used to get to this side of the bunker. To the west is another door that looks similar to the weapon"s door, except this one says "Armor Room."

rooms.name: Weapon Room
rooms.description: Walking into the room, you find a ton of different guns and weapons. Ranging from kenetic, like bullet weapons, rocket launchers, and energy weapons.  To the west is the door you came through from the storage hallway.

rooms.name: Armor Room
rooms.description: Entering the room, you see a ton of different armor pieces, plates, and some mechanical armor pieces. Some of these pieces look very similar to the ones on your walker. Towards the east is the door you came through, leading to the storage area.
